Class Shop

java.lang.Object
Shop
public class Shop
extends java.lang.Object
Provides methods and data field to create a Shop for hosting an inventory of items and suppliers.
Since:
2020-02-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Ledingham

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkItemQuantity​(Item item)
    Checks the quantity of an item.
    void decreaseItemQuantity​(int id, int amount)
    Decreases the quantity of an item by a specified amount.
    Inventory getInventory()
    Returns the inventory object of the shop.
    SupplierList getSupplierList()
    Returns the ArrayList of suppliers
    void importDataTextFiles()
    Imports data from text files by using utility class fileManager.
    void printInventory()
    Prints the inventory of the shop which includes even item.
    void printOrderTextFile()
    Prints the order for the inventory to a text file.
    Item searchToolID​(int id)
    Searches for item using item ID number.
    Item searchToolName​(java.lang.String s)
    Searches for item using item name.
    void setInventory​(Inventory inventory)
    Sets the Inventory of the shop.
    void setSupplierList​(SupplierList supplierList)

    • importDataTextFiles

      public void importDataTextFiles()
      Imports data from text files by using utility class fileManager.

    • checkItemQuantity

      public void checkItemQuantity​(Item item)
      Checks the quantity of an item.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to have its quantity checked.

    • decreaseItemQuantity

      public void decreaseItemQuantity​(int id, int amount)
      Decreases the quantity of an item by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of item to have quantity reduced.
      amount - Amount to decrease the quantity of item.

    • printInventory

      public void printInventory()
      Prints the inventory of the shop which includes even item.

      Prints the order for the inventory to a text file.

    • searchToolName

      public Item searchToolName​(java.lang.String s)
      Searches for item using item name.
      Parameters:
      s - Item name to search for.
      Returns:
      Returns the item.

    • searchToolID

      public Item searchToolID​(int id)
      Searches for item using item ID number.
      Parameters:
      id - Item ID to search for.
      Returns:
      Returns the item.

      Returns the inventory object of the shop.
